Trade/Device Name(s): LZI Hydrocodone Drugs of Abuse (DAU) Calibrators
LZI Hydrocodone Drugs of Abuse (DAU) Controls
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for LZI Hydrocodone Enzyme Immunoassay, Calibrators and Controls for qualitative and semi-quantitative determination of hydrocodone in urine using automated chemistry analyzers
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for the qualitative and semi-quantitative determination of hydrocodone in human urine at cutoff values of 100 and 300 ng/mL for prescription use with automated clinical chemistry analyzers; calibrators and controls are for use in calibration and quality control of the assay
